data.title: Stream from Virgin Media
data.meta_description: Introducing Stream from Virgin Media. Watch your favourite tv channels & streaming services in one place. Available with our ultrafast broadband.
data.text:
Get at least 10% Stream credit back on selected entertainment subscriptions you pay for through your Virgin Media bill. These include subscriptions like Netflix and Disney+ Premium, as well as Sky Sports and Essential Entertainment.

On your bill you'll either see a discount or a 10% credit applied to your combined subscription fees.

Stream can be added to all our broadband deals that don’t include Virgin TV. You could have our broadband without landline, broadband and phone, or broadband and sim deal – it’s easy to get Stream on top. Simply talk to us on Live Chat or request a call from our team. Our phone lines are open Monday to Friday (8am to 9pm), Saturday and Sunday (8am to 6pm).

Get at least 10% Stream credit back on selected entertainment subscriptions you pay for through your Virgin Media bill. These include subscriptions like Netflix and Disney+ Premium, as well as Sky Sports and Essential Entertainment.

On your bill you'll either see a discount or a 10% credit applied to your combined subscription fees.

Click and Collect Yodel, our courier, will keep you up to date. You get an email when your order’s shipped and another when it’s ready for you at your chosen collection point. You have 10 days to collect your order. Please take with you your ID and the collection barcode (see email). Just to let you know, if you’re unable to collect within 10 days, your order will be returned to us and you’ll be refunded.

Home delivery Yodel will email you when your order has shipped. Please use the code and tracking link to track your parcel, see the latest delivery updates or make changes to your delivery. The next email or text will come when your order is on its way, giving you an estimated 2 hour delivery window. A confirmation email will arrive when your order is successfully delivered.

Not for Stream, don’t worry. The Stream box simply plugs into your TV, no special cables need to be installed. But if you’re taking a new broadband deal from us and our cables aren’t already installed in your home, then you need to get the people who share your driveway to sign a quick form so we can install our broadband for you.

M125 Fibre Broadband: New customers only. Minimum term applies to your broadband service, check basket for details. M125 Fibre Broadband (average download speed 132Mbps). £44* a month for 18 months. Broadband only. If you cancel your service during your minimum term an early disconnection fee will apply. If you upgrade any aspect of the service, standard pricing will apply to that upgrade. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw or amend the pricing if you change any part of your package. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw this offer at any time. Offer may not be used in conjunction with any other offer unless stated by Virgin Media.

M250 Fibre Broadband: New customers only. Minimum term applies to your broadband service, check basket for details. M250 Fibre Broadband (average download speed 264Mbps). £50* a month for 18 months. Broadband only. If you cancel your service during your minimum term an early disconnection fee will apply. If you upgrade any aspect of the service, standard pricing will apply to that upgrade. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw or amend the pricing if you change any part of your package. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw this offer at any time. Offer may not be used in conjunction with any other offer unless stated by Virgin Media.

New customers only. Minimum term applies to your broadband service, check basket for details. M350 Fibre Broadband (average download speed 362Mbps). £56* a month for 18 months. Broadband only. If you cancel your service during your minimum term an early disconnection fee will apply. If you upgrade any aspect of the service, standard pricing will apply to that upgrade. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw or amend the pricing if you change any part of your package. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw this offer at any time. Offer may not be used in conjunction with any other offer unless stated by Virgin Media.

New customers only. Minimum term applies to your broadband service, check basket for details. M500 Fibre Broadband (average download speed 516Mbps). £62* a month for 18 months. Broadband only. If you cancel your service during your minimum term an early disconnection fee will apply. If you upgrade any aspect of the service, standard pricing will apply to that upgrade. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw or amend the pricing if you change any part of your package. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw this offer at any time. Offer may not be used in conjunction with any other offer unless stated by Virgin Media.

Gig1 is available in Southampton, Manchester, Reading, Birmingham, Coventry, Edinburgh, Liverpool, Glasgow, Leeds, London and Belfast and their surrounding areas. New customers only. Minimum term applies to your broadband service, check basket for details. Gig1 Fibre Broadband (average download speed 1130Mbps). £62* a month for 24 months, standard pricing thereafter (currently £62*). Broadband only. If you cancel your service during your minimum term an early disconnection fee will apply. If you upgrade any aspect of the service, standard pricing will apply to that upgrade. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw or amend the pricing if you change any part of your package. Virgin Media reserves the right to withdraw this offer at any time. Offer may not be used in conjunction with any other offer unless stated by Virgin Media.

From £10.99 a month for the standard plan. Price for additional plans will vary. Stream customers new to Netflix can benefit from Stream credit. Stream credit requires you to add a Netflix subscription to your Virgin Media bill and pay by Direct Debit. Members of households with an existing or recent Netflix membership may not be eligible for the Stream credit. Subscriptions are accessible immediately when added. As a result you’ll lose your 14-day right to cancel.

£10.99 a month. To use Disney+, you’ll need a Disney+ account and you must accept the Disney+ T&Cs. If you take Disney+ with Extras this will be incompatible with any other offer, including offers for Stream from Virgin Media. Subscriptions are accessible immediately when added. As a result you’ll lose your 14-day right to cancel.
